string.value: You should find #bJames#k, who's somewhere hiding inside the castle.
Hey! I heard that you were finally able to enter the castle. Is that true? Well then, please… Could you please find my brother for me?

Both of our parents passed away when we were young, so I basically raised my brother growing up. Ever since I became a Security Officer, we lived together within the castle walls, but when the evacuations happened, I was too busy protecting the Mushking to realize that I had left my brother inside.
He's lived there practically since birth, so he knows every corner of the castle. He's probably hiding quietly somewhere inside, hoping to be rescued. Please rescue my brother for me.
He's my only brother… please reconsider.
I… I am scared… Please…please help me…
What? My brother sent you here? Ahhh… I am safe now. Thank you so much…
